trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Venice
There were no other sightings in Venice on or around January 29th 2009
divs: sighting detailslooking south from my house not as high as jets a light just came on then headed north but way up in the stars. another one or same headed south east then west.. while looking at that one ..this off colored light of a star was swaying back and forth sun came up and its still there. i called and left a massage but left wrong date...everything started when i got home at 605 am something told me to look south and after a few moments thats when i saw a light appear it was lower than the jets flying over725 now and light is still there..please call me {pid} this is like the fourth time ive seen these lights in a month i woke my kids and showed them...they thought it was cool.but not if they come down and get us..jan 29 09 at 6:05 am... feeling was strange to me this time compare when i saw tha last lights i felt good.. {cms\jat\pid} text moved to narrative
Summary: 3 UFOs 1 over my house others went by north, south east,and west.
